constraint.name: DWF_SM_16 - A Mode/State has at least one incoming transition.
constraint.description: When designing an FSM, it is important that all Mode/State has at least one incoming transition. In fact, if no such transition exists, the Mode/State is said unreachable.
constraint.message: The {1}"{0}" is unreachable. At least one incoming transition should exist for this {1}.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_17 - There exists at least two outgoing transition from a Fork Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: A Fork Pseudo-State serves to split an incoming transition into two or more transitions.
constraint.message: The Fork"{0}" has less than two outgoing transitions. At least two outgoing transitions should exist for this Fork.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_18 - There exists at least two incoming transition to a Join Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: A Join Pseudo-State serves to merge several transitions.
constraint.message: The Join"{0}" has less than two incoming transitions. At least two incoming transitions should exist for this Join.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_19 - Into a region, there exists no more than one Initial Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: There is no more than one Initial Pseudo-State into a Region.
constraint.message: The Region"{0}" has more than one Initial Pseudo-State. In a region, should exist at most one Initial Pseudo-State.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_20 - There exists at least one transition starting from an Initial Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: Into a region with an Initial Pseudo-State, there exists at least one transition starting from this Initial Pseudo-State.
constraint.message: The Initial Pseudo-State "{0}" has no outgoing transition. At least one outgoing transition should exist for this Initial Pseudo-State.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_21 - There exists at most one transition starting from an Initial Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: Into a region with an Initial Pseudo-State, there exists at most one transition starting from this Initial Pseudo-State.
constraint.message: The Initial Pseudo-State"{0}" has more than one outgoing transition. The Initial Pseudo-State should have at most one outgoing transition.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_22 - Outgoing transitions of a Pseudo-State should not have a trigger.
constraint.description: Outgoing transitions of a Pseudo-State should not have a trigger.
constraint.message: The Pseudo-State"{0}" has one or more outgoing transitions that have trigger. Outgoing transitions of a Pseudo-State should not have a trigger.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_23 - There exists at least two outgoing transition from a Choice Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: There exists at least two outgoing transition from a Choice Pseudo-State.
constraint.message: The Choice Pseudo-State "{0}" has less than two outgoing transitions. At least two outgoing transitions should exist for this Choice.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_24 - Outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State should not have Guard.
constraint.description: Outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State should not have Guard.
constraint.message: The Fork Pseudo-State"{0}" has one or more outgoing transitions that have Guard. Outgoing transitions of a Fork Pseudo-State should not have a Guard.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_25 - Incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State should not have Guard.
constraint.description: Incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State should not have Guard.
constraint.message: The Join Pseudo-State"{0}" has one or more incoming transitions that have Guard. Incoming transitions of a Join Pseudo-State should not have a Guard.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_26 - Transitions starting from Initial Pseudo-States cannot have Guard.
constraint.description: Transitions starting from Initial Pseudo-States cannot have Guard.
constraint.message: The Initial Pseudo-State"{0}" has an outgoing transition that have Guard. Outgoing transition of an Initial Pseudo-State should not have a Guard.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_27 - Limit the number of inclusions of M/Ss into M/Ss to 3 levels.
constraint.description: Limit the number of inclusions of M/Ss into M/Ss to 3 levels.
constraint.message: The State "{0}" is in the level "{1}" of inclusions. The number of inclusions of M/Ss into M/Ss is limited to 3 levels.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_28 - A Mode/State has at least one outgoing transition.
constraint.description: When designing an FSM, it is important that all Mode/State have at least one outgoing transition. In fact, if no such transition exists, the Mode/State is said blocking state.
constraint.message: The {1}"{0}" is a blocking {1}. At least one outgoing transition should exist for this {1}.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_29 - Incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State should not have Trigger.
constraint.description: Incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State should not have Trigger.
constraint.message: The Join Pseudo-State"{0}" has one or more incoming transitions that have Trigger. Incoming transitions of a Join Pseudo-State should not have a Trigger.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_30 - Into a region, there exists at least one Initial Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: There is at least one one Initial Pseudo-State into a Region.
constraint.message: The Region"{0}" has no Initial Pseudo-State. In a region, should exist at least one Initial Pseudo-State.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_31 - At least one M/S of the component FSMs has this function set as available.
constraint.description: Let consider a function allocated to a component. If an FSM is linked to this component, then at least one M/S of this FSM has this function set as available.
constraint.message: The Function "{0}" is allocated to the Component "{1}". No M/S has this function set as available in the FSMs attached to this Component.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_32 - The function involved by the ‘do activity’ of the M/S has to be available in this M/S or in the M/S of the higher level (if existing).
constraint.description: The function involved by the ‘do activity’ of the M/S has to be available in this M/S or in the M/S of the higher level (if existing).
constraint.message: The Function "{1}" is involved by the "do activity" of the State "{0}", this Function has to be available in this State or in the State of the higher level (if existing).

constraint.name: DWF_SM_33 - All functions of a ‘functional chain’ should be allocated to a component if this functional chain is set available into a M/S of a FSM linked to this component.
constraint.description: A functional chain can be set available into a M/S of an FSM linked to a component, only if all functions of this functional chains are allocated to this component.
constraint.message: The functional chain ‘{0}’ is set available into a M/S of a FSM linked to the component {1}, all functions of this functional chain ‘{0}’ should be allocated to this component {1}.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_34 - The first element into the lifeline of a component should be a M/S if at least one FSM is linked to this component.
constraint.description: Within an exchange scenario, for the lifeline of a component for which an FSM is linked, one of the following is required: - Either the first object put into this lifeline is a M/S (of this FSM). - Or the diagram’s pre-condition defines the first M/S of the considered lifeline.
constraint.message: The first element into the lifeline ‘{0}’ of the component ‘{1}’ is not a M/S. This first element should be a M/S or the diagram’s pre-condition defines the first M/S of this lifeline.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_35 - Between two consecutive M/Ss placed on a lifeline, there exists a path of transitions between these M/Ss.
constraint.description: Within an exchange scenario, between two consecutive M/Ss placed on a lifeline, there exists a path of transitions between these M/Ss.
constraint.message: Between the consecutive M/Ss ‘{0}’ and ‘{1}’ placed on the lifeline ‘{2}’, there exists no path of transitions.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_36 - The functional exchange trigger of two consecutive M/Ss has to be added between these two M/Ss in the lifeline.
constraint.description: Within an exchange scenario, let consider two consecutive M/Ss put in a lifeline with an existing transition triggered by a functional exchange; if the lifeline of the architectural part (i.e.: another component or an actor), for which the function starting the functional exchange, is present into the exchange scenario; this functional exchange has to be added between these two M/Ss.
constraint.message: The functional exchange ‘{2}’ trigger a transition between the consecutive M/Ss ‘{0}’ and ‘{1}’ has to be added between these two M/Ss in the lifeline.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_38 - Target M/Ss of outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State must have to be in a distinct region than the Fork Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: Target M/Ss of outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State must have to be in a distinct region than the Fork Pseudo-State.
constraint.message: The Fork Pseudo-State ‘{0}’ has one or more target M/Ss of its outgoing transitions in the same Region than this Fork Pseudo-State. Target M/Ss of outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State must have to be in a distinct region than the Fork Pseudo-State.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_39 - Outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State must target M/Ss into distinct regions of an orthogonal state.
constraint.description: Outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State must target M/Ss into distinct regions of an orthogonal state.
constraint.message: Outgoing transitions from the Fork Pseudo-State ‘{0}’ target at least two M/Ss into the same region or into non concurrent regions. However, outgoing transitions from a Fork Pseudo-State must target M/Ss into distinct regions of an orthogonal state.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_40 - Source M/Ss of incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State must have to be in a distinct region than the Join Pseudo-State.
constraint.description: Source M/Ss of incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State must have to be in a distinct region than the Join Pseudo-State.
constraint.message: The Join Pseudo-State ‘{0}’ has one or more source M/Ss of its incoming transitions in the same Region than this Join Pseudo-State. Source M/Ss of incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State must have to be in a distinct region than the Join Pseudo-State.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_41 - Incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State must originate from M/Ss into different regions of an orthogonal state.
constraint.description: Incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State must originate from M/Ss into different regions of an orthogonal state.
constraint.message: Incoming transitions to the Join Pseudo-State ‘{0}’ originate at least from two M/Ss into the same region or into non concurrent regions. However, incoming transitions to a Join Pseudo-State must originate from M/Ss into different regions of an orthogonal state.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_42 - Final State should not include a Region.
constraint.description: Final State should not include a Region.
constraint.message: Tha Final State ‘{0}’ include at least one region. However, a final State should not include a Region.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_43 - Generate global modes of the system and then analyze the configurations availability.
constraint.description: Generate global modes of the system and then analyze the configurations availability in these global modes.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_44 - No inclusion of modes into states.
constraint.description: The inclusion of modes into states is not allowed.
constraint.message: The Mode "{0}" is included in the State "{1}". Inclusion of modes into states is not allowed.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_45 - No inclusion of states into modes .
constraint.description: The inclusion of states into modes is not allowed.
constraint.message: The State "{0}" is included in the Mode "{1}". Inclusion of states into modes is not allowed.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_50 - Element are included and excluded by CSConfiguration.
constraint.description: Element are included and excluded by CSConfiguration.
constraint.message: Element"{0}" are included and excluded by CSConfiguration: "{1}" and "{2}".

constraint.name: DWF_SM_52 -Realising configuration
constraint.message: {3} : Consistency warning: the function {0} is not included into both configurations {1} and {2}

constraint.name: DWF_SM_53-irregular realization between layer
constraint.message: {3} : Consistency error: the function {0} is at the same time included and excluded into both configurations {1} and {2}

constraint.name: DWF_SM_60 - Analysis of the comparison element completeness
constraint.message: Comparison {0} is incompletely defined : It must compare two configurations, or one configuration and one situation"

constraint.name: DWF_SM_61 - Analysis of the comparison element correctness
constraint.message: Comparison {0} is incorrectly defined : It must compare exactly two configurations, or one configuration and one situation. If a situation is compared, a result element that refers to the situation must exist."

constraint.name: DWF_SM_62 - Analysis of the comparison element consistency
constraint.message: {0} : {1} {2} is included by one configuration and excluded in the other

constraint.name: DWF_SM_63 - Analysis of the comparison element consistency
constraint.message: {0} : {1} {2}, via its involvement in a functional chain, is included by one configuration and excluded in the other

constraint.name: DWF_SM_90 - Analysis of the situation element construction (completeness and correctness)
constraint.message: Situation '{0}' is incompletely defined : No boolean expression

constraint.name: DWF_SM_96 - Analysis of the result element correctness
constraint.message: Result element {0} is incorrect : {1}

constraint.name: DWF_DC_34 - Analyzing the assurance of the FunctionalChain in the States/Modes.
constraint.description: Analyzing the assurance of the FunctionalChain in the States/Modes.

constraint.name: DWF_DC_35 - Analyzing the assurance of the FunctionalChains in the State/Mode.
constraint.description: Analyzing the assurance of the FunctionalChains in the State/Mode.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_95
constraint.message: For the {3} : {1} does not exist in {2}.
constraint.description: Compare each configuration or situation and check if they contain the same functions.

constraint.name: DWF_DC_36
constraint.message: The {0} is not included in the {1} but his port is included in the {2}.
constraint.description: Check if a included component has his port included in the other configuration.

constraint.name: DWF_DC_37
constraint.description: Check if an not or or operator have more than 1 values and if a not operator have only 1 value.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_97
constraint.message: The {0} include {1} but the {2} excludes a function which realizes {3}.
constraint.description: Compare each configuration (one in the system, and other in the logical) and check if they contain the same functions.

constraint.name: DWF_SM_98
constraint.message: The {0} include {1} but the {2} excludes a {4} which realizes {3}.
constraint.description: Compare each configuration (one in the pysical, and other in the logical) and check if they contain the same functions.
